B1 not far away: If there's a café nearby, we could stop for a snack. I noticed a policeman standing nearby. We stopped at some nearby shops to buy some food.
More examplesFewer examplesWater was pumped from a nearby lake in an attempt to damp down the flames.Thousands of fish were killed as a result of a discharge of poisonous chemicals from a nearby factory.The injured were taken to several nearby hospitals.A passing motorist stopped and gave her a lift to the nearby town.The explosion shattered nearby windows and wrecked two cars.
